external_games.name: Gnome Dash: Rise of the Trolls

name: Gnome Dash: Rise of the Trolls
summary:
Fly, Bounce, Run, Dig, and Laugh through an Endless Magical Adventure!
Long Ago a wise Gnome foretold of a day when trolls would rise up and take these magical lands from the Gnomes... Today is that day and with the help of wise fairies and joyous creatures it is up to you to search and scour the magical worlds with wit and speed to complete all quests and find the pieces to put together Project: SWIFT a cybernetic fox, or it may be the end as we know it...
Are you Gnome enough to save us all?
